To be consistent in the naming. This enables an additional List<EObj>
for the EReference in the future.

Task #676: Rename bean lists

timeline.bodyText: Minor considertion: should it be called ...bean or ...beans? For me it is accessing a list of beans but for consistency to the otehr methods we acces the otehr non array proeprties with bean...
